name: Midland States Bank
description: Midland States Bank is a community bank based in Effingham, Illinois, serving clients across the Midwest. Founded in 1881, the bank has established a long-standing reputation for providing personalized banking services and financial solutions to individuals, businesses, and communities. Midland States Bank offers a comprehensive suite of banking products including personal and commercial loans, mortgages, deposit accounts, and wealth management services. The bank is committed to fostering economic growth in the regions it serves by offering tailored financial solutions designed to meet the unique needs of its customers. With a focus on customer service and community involvement, Midland States Bank actively participates in local initiatives and supports various charitable organizations. The bank's mission is to enhance the quality of life for its customers by helping them achieve their financial goals while also contributing positively to the communities it serves. As a trusted financial partner, Midland States Bank combines traditional banking values with modern technology to provide convenient and efficient banking experiences.

seo.meta_title: Midland States Bank | Community Banking & Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Midland States Bank, a community bank offering personalized banking solutions and financial services in the Midwest. Learn more about our products and services.

faq.question: What services does Midland States Bank offer?
faq.answer: Midland States Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Midland States Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Midland States Bank is headquartered in Effingham, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Midland States Bank?
faq.answer: Jeffrey G. Hultman is the CEO of Midland States Bank.

faq.question: When was Midland States Bank founded?
faq.answer: Midland States Bank was founded in 1881.
